    • About Daniela Antelo


    Daniela Antelo has been a Houston-based real estate professional since 2011. Over the course of her career, she has earned multiple designations, such as Certified Negotiation Expert (CNE), Accredited Luxury Home Specialist (ALHS) an Accredited Buyer Representative (ABR). She earned her Broker’s license in 2018 and is currently a Broker Associate with Keller Williams Realty.
